text: Joel G. Virador (5 March 1967 â€“ 7 May 2019) was a Filipino politician and human rights activist. He was a member of Bayan Muna. He served as a member of the House of Representatives of the Philippines from November 2003 to June 2007. He was born in Kidapawan City, Cotabato. Virador died of papillary thyroid cancer on 7 May 2019 in Davao City. He was 52. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from thyroid cancer Category:Filipino politicians Category:Human rights activists Category:Cotabato Category:Cancer deaths in the Philippines
title: Joel Virador
